divs: Sighting Details I waa driving along at night and noticed a large shadowlike object on the horizon descending over the tree tops just off towards the river. My car radio went fuzzy but I hardly noticed as i pulled over to see what was flying above the trees. I thought it was a stealth bomber at first but then remembered that they do not hover or make strange whistling sounds. The object was a boomerang shape around 150-200 ft. from wing tip to tip and around 75 ft. from nose to rear.It flew a short slow path of about a quarter mile over the river and slowly turned south and slowly cruised away, just making that odd whistling sound. I did not feel any effects or anything from the expeience just confusion from what not really knowing what I just saw,but I will say this, It did fly off to the south and Dobbins Air Force Base is located about 100 miles south of our town. I do not know If the object flew off to the base or changed course after I lost site but I Have seen other reports where UFO,s frequent military bases at times. This is bthe first I have told of this and I hope it might be helpful, thanks for listening, and believing.
Summary: driving north, observed large shadowlike object on the horizon as it grew larger as i got closer, I stopped to see what it was.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Blairsville
There were no other sightings in Blairsville on or around November 20th 1992
